title: Need Help Plz
body: I Keep Geting High Ping Like 1k Or More In some games i dont know what to do i randomly go afk for no reason and my internet is not the problem i got 20 min for 5 games for this Plz HELPPPPP!!!!!

replies.body: It sounds like your network is suffering from some packet loss or failing connection, which can cause higher ping or input delays.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get a solid analysis of what's really happening.  The results will also provide you with a list of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I did every thing but it still dident work it says i have packet loss

Thanks for the update!  The log reader results is a good thing, because now we know what we're dealing with!  This packet loss might be due to a network problem, or how your ISP is routing to the game server.  Go over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved for good!  Let me know if you have any questions.
